ingredients.ingredient: 7 ounces dark chocolate (65 to 70% cocao), chopped into small pieces
2 tablespoons strong brewed coffee, or more to taste

cookingTips: Bring eggs to room temperature to ensure proper emulsification
Melt chocolate gently over double boiler to prevent scorching
Fold in egg whites in two batches for best volume and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the citrus zest enhance the chocolate flavor in this elegant mousse, and what technique ensures a light, airy texture?
